description: This Cyclops Team member is Steiner`s right-hand man, and a seasoned veteran in his own right. Notably fond of booze, Misha always enters battle with a flask of bourbon in his cockpit. This doesn`t seem to impair his combat abilities, though - during his sortie in the assault mobile suit KÃ¤mpfer, Misha single-handedly wipes out the entire mobile suit complement of the Federation carrier Gray Phantom.
name: Mikhail Kaminsky
